title: A whole team disconnect
body: As I played a game at 11:30 pm Saturday 07/03/2015, the game at 1 combat the entire my team and about 3 of the other team got disconnect at the same time. It's was a rank game and my team losing because of this "accident". I don't ask for anything because I know this sever has a lot of problem. However, my friend was on the series so I ask if Riot can prevent this losing game for him.

replies.body: Loss Prevented does not function in an individual basis. It's a switch which Riot flips if they believe there are server wide issues occurring. If a game has been recorded as complete, then that's how it will be.
Actually I can for once confirm this disconnect. Every one on OCE was disconnected at once (Included my self). It was not how ever significant enough to warrant a Loss Prevented.
Yeah. It's unfortunate, but if the game is completed before/after Riot hit the button, then they can't reverse it for individual cases.
